text: euclid avenue is shorter as the crow flies, but it has speed bumps, which appreciably increase point-to-point drive time, making it the less efficient choice. but you have the conn. of course, if you're not going to slow down for the speed bumps, i withdraw my previous objection. here's a fun question. do you know what the most common street name is?
